Skip to content
Reen

Blog

To customize Blog, navigate to Reen > Blog.

Blog Layout

Here you can specify the layout that is applied to posts on your site. Reen allows you to display your Blog posts in 3 different layouts.

  • Right Sidebar – This is the default layout. The Blog page will have 2 columns divided roughly into 75% and 25%. The 75% of the screen is the main content and it displays the blog posts. The 25% screen of the screen is the sidebar and it displays widgets. As the name suggests, the sidebar will be to the right side of the screen.
  • Left Sidebar – Same as Sidebar Right except that the Sidebar appears to the left of the screen.
  • Full-width – This layout does not display any sidebars. The Full-width layout can have be widely dense which means the content section occupies from left to right ends or narrowly dense which means the content section will be only 75% wide as in sidebar layouts but aligned centered.

Blog Style

You can select the style for the blog

  • Classic
  • Grid

Single Blog Layout

Single Blog Page has 3 different layouts.

  • Right Sidebar – This is the default layout. The Single Blog page will have 2 columns divided roughly into 75% and 25%. The 75% of the screen is the main content and it displays the single blog. The 25% screen of the screen is the sidebar and it displays widgets. As the name suggests, the sidebar will be to the right side of the screen.
  • Left Sidebar – Same as Sidebar Right except that the Sidebar appears to the left of the screen.
  • Full-width – This layout does not display any sidebars. The Full-width layout can have be widely dense which means the content section occupies from left to right ends or narrowly dense which means the content section will be only 75% wide as in sidebar layouts but aligned centered.

Enable Popular Posts: Choose if you want to enable popular posts section in blog page Yes or No.

Blog Post Author Info: You can enable or disable blog post author info.

Enable Post Navigation: You can enable or disable post navigation.

Blog Social Sharing: You can enable or disable blog social sharing.

Enable Related Posts: Choose if you want to enable related posts section in single blog post Yes or No.

Updated on December 19, 2019
